name: Smart Car Parking System
problem: Inefficient parking management and lack of real-time slot availability
description: A comprehensive parking management system with admin controls, real-time slot tracking, billing, and payment processing. Features include vehicle entry/exit management, automated billing, and dashboard analytics.

name: Travel UI Website
problem: Creating an engaging and pixel-perfect travel booking interface
description: A stunning travel website with immersive UI sections, community features, and tour selection. Implements custom fonts (Satoshi, Playfair Display) and smooth animations for enhanced user experience.

name: Sworm Multi-Country Simulation
problem: Simulating complex multi-country economic and social systems
description: A sophisticated simulation system managing multiple countries with real-time data updates, historical tracking, and interactive UI with tab switching and sidebar responsiveness.

name: Library Management System
problem: Streamlining book borrowing and library operations
description: Full-stack library management with CRUD operations for books, users, and borrow records. Features secure API integration, modern responsive UI, and comprehensive testing.

name: Fitness Tracker PWA
problem: Tracking workouts, health metrics, and fitness progress
description: Progressive web app for fitness tracking with workout streak visualization, health metrics, supplement tracking, and dynamic exercise sets. Includes GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline.

name: Docker Containerization Setup
problem: Simplifying multi-service deployment and environment consistency
description: Complete containerization setup for multi-service applications with Docker Compose orchestration, CI/CD pipeline, and automated testing workflows.
